org.apache.samoa.examples

Class HelloWorldTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.samoa.examples.HelloWorldTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.javacliparser.Configurable, Serializable, Task

    public class HelloWorldTask
extends Object
implements Task, com.github.javacliparser.Configurable
    Example Task in SAMOA. This task simply sends events from a source HelloWorldSourceProcessor to a destination HelloWorldDestinationProcessor. The events are random integers generated by the source and encapsulated in a HelloWorldContentEvent. The destination prints the content of the event to standard output, prepended by the processor id. The task has 2 main options: the number of events the source will generate (-i) and the parallelism level of the destination (-p).
    See Also:
